short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let's make President Trump a snuggly kitten.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Does Donald Trump's comments have you down? Well, turn that frown upside down!

Snuggly Trump will replace any mentions or images of the Donald that it can find with a snuggly kitten name and image.

Now supports changing talking points like border wall (litter box) and voter fraud (catnip disappearance) along with republicans (kitties/feline) and Mexico (the Humans)!

Don't let the man get you down.
